Package imagingbook.calibration.zhang

Class HomographyEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.calibration.zhang.HomographyEstimator
  • public class HomographyEstimator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective) transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HomographyEstimator()  
      HomographyEstimator​(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement)

      Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and multiple observations (image point sets).

      Estimates the homography (projective) transformation from two given 2D point sets.

      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Used for testing only.

      Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.

    • Method Detail

      • estimateHomographies

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix[] estimateHomographies​(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] modelPts,
                                                                         java.awt.geom.Point2D[][] obsPoints)
        Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and multiple observations (image point sets). The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
        Parameters:
        modelPts - a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
        obsPoints - a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
        Returns:
        the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view

      • estimateHomography

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix estimateHomography​(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] ptsA,
                                                                     java.awt.geom.Point2D[] ptsB)
        Estimates the homography (projective) transformation from two given 2D point sets. The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
        Parameters:
        ptsA - the 1st sequence of 2D points
        ptsB - the 2nd sequence of 2D points
        Returns:
        the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)

      • refineHomography

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix refineHomography​(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix Hinit,
                                                                   java.awt.geom.Point2D[] pntsA,
                                                                   java.awt.geom.Point2D[] pntsB)
        Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
        Parameters:
        Hinit - the initial (estimated) homography matrix
        pntsA - the 1st sequence of 2D points
        pntsB - the 2nd sequence of 2D points
        Returns:
        the refined homography matrix

      • getJacobianFunction

        protected org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction​(java.awt.geom.Point2D[] X)

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Used for testing only.
        Parameters:
        args - ignored
